subject: Good Day
body:
Good Day
Permit me to enlist into your service ,I am Mr. Elliot Hunter (Non-Executive Director of Falklands Oil & Gas
Plc. United Kingdom) I
got your contact from Chambers of Commerce and Industry in search of a competent person who will handle issues
with the Highest level of secrecy and integrity.
Once I receive your assurance that you are able to keep it a secret and you are a man/woman of proven integrity
 I will provide you with the full details of my business plans which I am ready to provide the Business Capital
to facilitate it.
I await your Consent.
Yours Sincerely
Mr. Elliot Hunter,
United Kingdom.

subject: Re:   Good Day
body:
Hello Mr. Elliot Hunter,

Good day to you! I'm delighted to receive your message and I appreciate the trust you've placed in me by reaching out. It's quite an honor to be considered for such a role.

I'm intrigued by your business plans and would love to hear more about them. Could you perhaps share a bit more about what these plans entail? Also, could you tell me more about Falklands Oil Gas Plc.? I'd like to understand better the nature of the company and its operations.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
June

subject: Re: Thanks For Your Response
body:
Good Day, 
Thanks for your response and willingness to partner with me in this endeavor, I do hope that you are a God fearing person who will handle issues with the highest level of trust and responsibility, My name is Mr. Elliot Hunter (Non-Executive Director of Falklands Oil & Gas Plc. United Kingdom) The Chairman of the Committee  responsible for  contracts awards. 
Before I proceed with full details of this endeavor I will appeal with you to work with me with utmost good faith and trust, as soon as this is established we will not have any problem in carrying out this endeavor 
In 2019 Falkland Oil and Gas Plc United Kingdom awarded a contract for the servicing of our oil pipeline throughout Europe , A contract that was estimated at $47,000,000.00 (Forty Seven Million United States Dollars)unknown to the Management of Falkland Oil & Gas  was over influenced to $94,000,000.00 (Ninety Four Million United States Dollars) the Company that executed this contract have since been completely paid living the over invoiced balance of $47,000,000.00 (Forty Seven Million United States Dollars),I did it with collaboration of the original company that executed the contract and they have collected their own  . 
Now it is this $47,000,000.00 (Forty Seven Million United States Dollars) that is left that I want to present your name or your company name as the Sub-contractor to claim the balance funds . 
You  are going to carry out this endeavor  strictly under my directives and I need your maximum cooperation so that this endeavor will be concluded within seven working days, I have all the documents that is required to claim this fund and I also have an insider in the Bank where this funds is presently deposited. I have implored the services of an accredited Attorney who will give us all the Legal backing that is required to successfully complete this endeavor . 
Immediately I receive the necessary details from you i will hand it over to the Lawyer who is going to assist  us throughout the whole process and arrange a face to face meeting between you and Him to meet and sign the Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) that will guide us through before we commence . 
Immediately this fund is released into your account I will resign from Falkland Oil & Gas and relocate with my family to your Country to invest this funds into a lucrative business endeavor  in your country and we will share the profit turn over  every year at the ration of 60/40 , 60% for me as the provider of the business capital while 40% will be for you. 
For now all I need is (1) Your full names and address, (2) Your Telephone Number (3) Your Profession (4)Marital status 
As soon as I receive your  details I will put you in contact with the Attorney to commence the pepper work immediately . 
Feel Free to ask questions where you do not understand so that you can be dully clarified before we proceed further 
I await your consent. 
Yours Sincerely, 
Mr. Elliot Hunter, 
United Kingdom.

subject: Re: Thanks For Your Response
body:
Hello Mr. Elliot Hunter,

I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your proposal sounds quite intriguing and it's not every day that one receives such an opportunity. However, I do have a few questions before we proceed further.

Firstly, could you please elaborate on the nature of the endeavor? You mentioned something about an over-invoiced balance of Forty Seven Million United States Dollars. How exactly did this happen and why is it left unclaimed?

Secondly, you mentioned that I would need to carry out this endeavor strictly under your directives. Could you provide more details on what these directives might entail?

Lastly, you mentioned a face-to-face meeting with an attorney and signing a Memorandum of MOU. Could you explain more about this process? What would be my responsibilities in this regard?

I'm sorry for all the questions but as they say, better safe than sorry! Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
June

subject: Re: Thanks For Your Response
body:
Dear June, 
Thanks for your cooperation.  I have read your message carefully and noted the contents therein. However its very important to clarify your question and areas you have mentioned.....the point is that this money came as an over invoiced contract. The original contractors have gone and received their payment leaving behind the excess fund which is the balance of $47Million. It is this money I want to move into your account using your name as a sub contractor.  I have constantly communicated with the lawyer who will normalize everything and drafting an Agreement that we will sign as partners. 
The lawyer will prepare the agreement and send to you, so there will be no need of face to face meeting, the meeting shall after you are in possession of the fund. 
Best regards. 
Elliot Hunter.

subject: Re: Thanks For Your Response
body:
Hello Elliot Hunter,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I must say, it's quite an interesting situation you've found yourself in! I'm curious about this over invoiced contract and how it works. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about that? 

Also, you mentioned a lawyer who will normalize everything. What exactly does the normalization process involve? And what kind of agreement are we talking about here?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
June
